columns.name: job_record_id
columns.comment: Job record this task falls under

columns.name: job_id
columns.comment: Unique job_id

columns.name: creation_time
columns.comment: Time that the data was originally recorded at the source

columns.name: local_jobid
columns.comment: Job or vm instance identifier from resource manager

columns.name: local_job_array_index
columns.comment: Job Array index id

columns.name: local_job_id_raw
columns.comment: Resource where the task executed

columns.name: resource_id
columns.comment: Resource where the task executed

columns.name: systemaccount_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The id of the resource system account (local username) under which the job ran. References systemaccount.id

columns.name: person_id
columns.comment: Person executing this task

columns.name: person_organization_id
columns.comment: The organization of the person who ran the task

columns.name: person_nsfstatuscode_id
columns.comment: The NSF status code of the person who ran the task

columns.name: job_task_type_id
columns.comment: Task type or event

columns.name: name
columns.comment: User-specified job name

columns.name: submit_time_ts
columns.comment: Task submission time in seconds since epoch (UTC)

columns.name: start_time_ts
columns.comment: Task start time in seconds since epoch (UTC)

columns.name: end_time_ts
columns.comment: Task completion time in seconds since epoch (UTC)

columns.name: eligible_time_ts
columns.comment: The eligible time in Unix time.

columns.name: start_day_id
columns.comment: Day id of the job start time in format YYYY00DDD, e.g. 201600143. This is the day in the timezone of the LOCAL database and NOT UTC!

columns.name: end_day_id
columns.comment: Day id of the job end time in format YYYY00DDD, e.g. 201600143. This is the day in the timezone of the LOCAL database and NOT UTC!

columns.name: eligible_day_id
columns.comment: Day id of the job eligible time in format YYYY00DDD, e.g. 201600143. This is the day in the timezone of the LOCAL database and NOT UTC!

columns.name: node_count
columns.comment: Number of nodes consumed

columns.name: processor_count
columns.comment: Number of processor cores consumed

columns.name: memory_kb
columns.comment: Memory consumed

columns.name: wallduration
columns.comment: Overall job duration in seconds

columns.name: waitduration
columns.comment: Time the job waited in the queue

columns.name: cpu_time
columns.comment: The amount of the cpu time (processor_count * wallduration)

columns.name: local_charge_su
columns.comment: Local resource SUs charged

columns.name: adjusted_charge_su
columns.comment: Local resource SUs charged after SP adjustments

columns.name: local_charge_xdsu
columns.comment: XDSUs charged. Uses current resource conv factor

columns.name: adjusted_charge_xdsu
columns.comment: XDSUs charged after SP adjustments

columns.name: local_charge_nu
columns.comment: NUs charged. XDSU * 21.576

columns.name: adjusted_charge_nu
columns.comment: NUs charged after SP adjustments. XDSU & 21.576

columns.name: group_name
columns.comment: The name of the group that ran the job.

columns.name: gid_number
columns.comment: The GID of the group that ran the job.

columns.name: uid_number
columns.comment: The UID of the user that ran the job.

columns.name: exit_code
columns.comment: The code that the job exited with.

columns.name: exit_state
columns.comment: The state of the job when it completed.

columns.name: cpu_req
columns.comment: The number of CPUs required by the job.

columns.name: mem_req
columns.comment: The amount of memory required by the job.

columns.name: timelimit
columns.comment: The time limit of the job in seconds.

columns.name: conversion_factor
columns.comment: Factor used to normalize local SU to TG Roaming (XDSU)

columns.name: completed
columns.comment: Boolean flag 1 = job complete

columns.name: is_deleted
columns.comment: Boolean flag 1 = job has been deleted
